doc:
Jack Melford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Melford 0 John Kenneth George Melford Smith (5 September 1899 – 22 October 1972) was a British stage, film and television actor. He was the younger brother of screenwriter and film director Austin Melford. On stage from the age of 12, Melford made his film debut in 1931. As well as appearing in various films and television shows, he also played Menelaus in the Doctor Who story The Myth Makers. John_Kenneth_George_Melford_Smith ( 5_September_1899 – 22_October_1972 ) was a_British_stage , film_and_television_actor .
